name: Angifr
author: Alexey 'gdever' Dodonov

sections.description:
This plugin will allow you to give gifts to your customers or populate your own coupons on another web sites.

Plugin uses our API wich is used as cenralized storage of gifts and coupons. Terms of use can be found here – https://angift.ru/terms-of-api-usage
sections.faq:
Can I submit my gift and coupons to the pool?

Sure, write a letter on the ad@angift.ru and follow the instructions.

Are there any limits?

For now you are allowed to give fetch only 3 gifts per day. Soon we shall increase these limits.
sections.changelog:
v 1.0

First release wich allow you to get gifts from our pool and give them to your customers.
